00033 #ifndef __BOP_EDGE_H__
00034 #define __BOP_EDGE_H__
00035 
00036 #include "BOP_Indexs.h"
00037 #include "BOP_Misc.h"
00038 
00039 class BOP_Edge
00040 {
00041 private:
00042     BOP_Index  m_vertexs[2];
00043     BOP_Indexs m_faces;
00044 #ifdef BOP_NEW_MERGE
00045     bool m_used;
00046 #endif
00047 
00048     bool containsFace(BOP_Index i);
00049 
00050 public:
00051     BOP_Edge(BOP_Index v1, BOP_Index v2);
00052     inline BOP_Index getVertex1() { return m_vertexs[0];};
00053     inline BOP_Index getVertex2() { return m_vertexs[1];};
00054     void replaceVertexIndex(BOP_Index oldIndex, BOP_Index newIndex);
00055     inline BOP_Index getFace(unsigned int i){return m_faces[i];};
00056     inline unsigned int getNumFaces(){return m_faces.size();};
00057     inline BOP_Indexs &getFaces(){return m_faces;};
00058     void addFace(BOP_Index face);
00059 #ifdef BOP_NEW_MERGE
00060     bool removeFace(BOP_Index i);
00061     bool getUsed() { return m_used;};
00062     void setUsed(bool setting) { m_used=setting;};
00063 #endif
00064 #ifdef BOP_DEBUG
00065     friend ostream &operator<<(ostream &stream, BOP_Edge *e);
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 };
